message.content:
cs.CL, cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR. 

This paper is about improving captioning tasks, which involves natural language processing (NLP) and computer vision (CV) techniques. Therefore, cs.CL (Computation and Language) and cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) are the most likely sub-categories. The paper proposes a new objective function to improve the performance of captioning models, which involves machine learning techniques. Therefore, cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) are also likely sub-categories. Finally, the paper discusses the limitations of the current approach and proposes a new method to address them, which involves information retrieval (IR) techniques. Therefore, cs.IR (Information Retrieval) is also a likely sub-category.
